It is a triangle that is divided into smaller and smaller triangles, each with the same shape and size as the original. This process of division continues indefinitely, creating a fractal pattern that exhibits infinite detail and complexity.

This means that no matter how closely you look at the triangle, you will always see the same basic shape and structure.
